page.title: 16LIFE IN OLD FOLD,GATESHEAD
page.content: A survey of parents by class 4 at St.Wilfrid's school showed that people who had lived here all their lives would not like to move. They were used to the area. Their{families}and{ {friends}lived here. They liked the people and had good{neighbours}. Most of them liked the{Stadium, {library and Community Centre}but would like more{open spaces}where youngsters could play and be creative instead of having organised activities. They thought that the Felling by-pass was too dangerous although they would like more bus services. Some parents did not like the area. It was{not as good as it used to be.} Litter and vandalism were problems and people needed to get together to clean up and improve the place.
